docs.snippet: LONDON, April 24 -- The British Government took a final step in safeguarding the security of Anglo-American invasion forces and their plans for an offensive against Western Europe tonight when it announced the suspension of all overseas travel, ex...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 24 -- The British Government took a final step in safeguarding the security of Anglo-American invasion forces and their plans for an offensive against Western Europe tonight when it announced the suspension of all overseas travel, except on business of national importance, after midnight Thursday.

docs.snippet: AUCKLAND, N.Z., Oct. 16 -New Zealand has opened the way for the resumption of tourist visits to the United States, suspended since World War II because of the dollar shortage. The Government has approved an allowance of $14 daily with a maximum of...
docs.lead_paragraph: AUCKLAND, N.Z., Oct. 16 -New Zealand has opened the way for the resumption of tourist visits to the United States, suspended since World War II because of the dollar shortage. The Government has approved an allowance of $14 daily with a maximum of $280 a year for nonbusiness trips.
docs.abstract: NZ to let natls spend $280 a yr for non-business trips, allowing visits for 1st time since World War II
